sentence.Network_en: In rural areas, the school is often the focal point for the local community.
sentence.Network_cn: 在农村，学校常常是当地社区的活动中心。

sentence.Network_en: The brochure described the library as the focal point of learning on the campus.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本小册子把图书馆形容为校园学习的中心。

sentence.Network_en: Consequently, even as the blogosphere continues to expand, only a few blogs are likely to emerge as focal points.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果，尽管博客圈继续扩大，但仅有少数的博客有可能脱颖而出，成为关注的焦点。

list.abs: 数学词汇英语翻译(F-M) ... focal length 焦距 focal line 焦线 focal plane 焦平面.
...较短的景深。这意味着在同一时刻，沿着Z轴只有一个较窄的空间是处于聚焦清晰范围的。当摄影机移焦时，他/她把焦点从一个焦平面（focal plane）移到另一个焦平面。在移焦时，观众的注意力从一个焦平面处的对象转移到另一个焦平面处的对象上。通过较短景.
...的影响一、口腔病灶感染学说病灶(focus) 病灶感染(focal infection) 二、牙周医学的兴起牙周医学（periodontal medicine)是一个.
特种长距离镜头和电动变倍镜头，生产定做镜头 ... 工作电流 Power Consumption 镜头焦距 Focal Length 变倍比 Optical zoom.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from modern Latin focalis, from Latin focus, or directly from focus

entry.def: Focal is used to describe something that relates to the point where a number of rays or lines meet.
Focal is used to describe something that is very important.

example.ex: ...one of the focal centres of the Far East.

means.word_mean: 1. having or localized centrally at a focus;
2. of or relating to a focus;

auth_sentence.content: It remains a focal point for all football fans.

auth_sentence.content: West Nile virus is a very focal disease.

means.word_mean: 中心的;很重要的;焦点的;有焦点的

sentences.en: the focal point of his life
In what sense was the discovery of America a focal point in history?
sentences.cn: 从什么意义上讲美洲的发现是历史上的一个重大事件呢？
